data.title: The Web Standards Project, Animated GIF

summary.content: I was browsing the internet the other day looking at a variety of articles written by Jeffrey Zeldman. I happened to come across an article at The Noodle Incident, where I found this GIF. I got to the bottom of the article, and came across this GIF. Ahhh, web standards…

content.html:
I was browsing the internet the other day looking at a variety of articles written by Jeffrey Zeldman. I happened to come across an article at The Noodle Incident, where I found this GIF.

I got to the bottom of the article, and came across this GIF. Ahhh, web standards…
